alert.note: Alert for Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Searcy, northeastern Newton and southwestern Marion Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Piercetown, or near Jasper, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Jasper... Western Grove... Carver... Duff... Point Peter... Maumee... Rush... Eula... Piercetown... Pruitt... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Zach... Bass... Yardelle... Morning Star... Ralph... Silver Hill... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations
